ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question, without Iron Raptor or Prowl active, who s gonna be acting leader at Maximal city? I d gladly take over but the only one I have anywhere

I have a question, without Iron Raptor or Prowl active, who's gonna be
acting leader at Maximal city? I'd gladly take over but the only one I have
anywhere near is Ice. She's not the best choice but If theres no other
options I'll do it.
----- Original Message -----
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 07, 2001 8:23 PM
Subject: Everyone read: I REPEAT, EVERYONE READ. Decepticons Forever/
Autobots Roll OUT


> OOC: Okay everyone, I want to get this game moving, since many people
> have stated, it has stopped, almost for good. I know that rAuq and Yan
> are temporarily away, that Megan has quit (sigh) and that people never
> seem to reply  anymore. Another problem is we have a new council dropped
> on it's head (okay not really a council, ME for christ sakes, Hedge
> where are you?) and I never was told what to do.
>
> First of all, no one replied to my last rant, I repeat, everyone must at
> least skim every message to make sure it does not apply to them, and if
> it does, reply. No one said anything about me playing out rAuq's
> characters, and Lurker, Airly, you guys never replied to my ask for
> suggestions on how to be a better leader, making it so I am not even
> sure if you guys read it. Kslawdogg, if you could get this IGL going
> please, so we can speed up the RPG, also, WHat happened to Grimlock, did
> you post about it? What about Jagged and Nightmare. Without further Apu,
> and since no one argued, here is a super long post.
>
>
Pacifix/Technobots/Menasor/Abominus/Astrotrain/Swoop/Grimlock/Jagged/Nightma
re/Megatron/Hook/Bonecrusher/Soundwave/Frenzy/Rumble/Spinister/
> Crossroads/Firedrill/Cliffjumper/Beachcomber/Hoist.
>
> Autobots
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> Beachcomber looked on in awe, as the ship disapeared with his friends.
> He ran up to RedHot, "They, they got away." he mummured.
>
> Scattershot looked oh, "Oh no they won't, not with a Technobot." he then
> turned to them. "Transform, and roll out." he shouted, as he leapt into
> the air, and transformed into his Jet mode, speeding away towards the
> Arena like ship, the other Technobots followed.
>
> Pacifix looked on as his troops were scattering. "No, not now, not
> without a plan." he said in disbelief, as the ships doors folded open,
> Hoist trudging out.
>
> "The computer is back online sir." Hoist said in ignorance to what was
> happening.
>
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
>
> Decepticons
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
>
> Dominjoe landed near the Constructicons and Soundwave, as they all
> looked around. The cockpit opened, and Megatron flew out of it,
> transforming into his large robot mode. He looked to his old troops, and
> began to speak informally.
>
> "Greetings Decepticons, It is time to rejoin the cause you gave your
> life to Millions of years ago, that, or be oblitorated." he said, firing
> his fusion cannon into the air to add an exclamation point to his
> phrase.
>
> Bonecrusher looked in awe. "It can't be, Megatron."
>
> Rumble and Frenzy walked forward away from Proto 1000. "Yeah, we saw you
> die." They said in unison.
>
> Soundwave looked at both of them, no emotion showing on his face.
>
> "Megatron obviously exists."
>
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> Decepticon Ship
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
>
> "Come on, hurry up Abominus." Astrotrains voice complained, showing the
> weariness in him. Then out of nowhere the island began to shake.
>
> Meanwhile deep under the water, Abominus plunged his second hand deep
> within the core of the Islands anchor to the earth, as he placed his big
> hands around the ship, then he began to pull, his eyes showing no sign
> of intelligence, as he placed his foot on the island core for leverage.
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
> Grimlock's rescue attempt
> ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
>
> Grimlock arced towards the giant threatening robot. "Wrong, you release
> Autobots, and Grimlock not smash you." he yelled.
>
> Behind the ship, Firedrill finally arrived, and transformed, and began
> banging his fists agains it's armored sides. "Let Cliffjumper gooooooo."
> He screamed with rage.
>
>
>
